```{r, include=FALSE}
ord.phy97.f.clade.p.C <- ordinate(phy97.f.clade.p.C, method = "MDS", distance = "bray")
evals <- ord.phy97.f.clade.p.C$values$Eigenvalues
plot_ordination(phy97.f.clade.p.C, ord.phy97.f.clade.p.C, color = "Coral_Species") +
  labs(col = "Binned Age") +
  coord_fixed(sqrt(evals[2] / evals[1]))

ord.phy97.f.clade.p.C.AD <- ordinate(phy97.f.clade.p.C.AD, method = "MDS", distance = "bray")
evals <- ord.phy97.f.clade.p.C.AD$values$Eigenvalues
plot_ordination(phy97.f.clade.p.C.AD, ord.phy97.f.clade.p.C.AD, color = "Status") +
  labs(col = "Binned Age") +
  coord_fixed(sqrt(evals[2] / evals[1]))
```
